name: monke mania
description:
Monke Mania is a game about being a monke.

You have to get around town while stealing and getting stolen from, using powerful items to help you find your way around.

You can even... use CHEATCODES*

*Cheatcodes are hard to find (only have a 1 in 250 chance) but good luck!

Bad? Never. The Monkes are the rulers.

So prove your worth and play today.

DISCLAIMER: Prototype edition, will be buggy, sorry...
